grow_event_type_flying/3901_1301_0100_10:
Hehehe. Actually, we were doing some training
so that we could beat you in our next battle.
I’ll show you the resolve of a mentor Trainer!
grow_event_type_flying/3902_1301_0100_10:
I’m ready anytime you are. Time to put the results
of my secret training to the test!
grow_event_type_flying/3903_1301_0100_10:
It’s time for my workout! What would you say to
being my opponent?
